info.name: Star Trek API
info.description: An API covering Characters and Ships from Star Trek eras TNG (The Next Generation) to DS9 (Deep Space 9).

item.name: Ships

request.description: Get a Ship by specified `id`.

Create a new Ship.

### Parameters
- `name` : The ship's name.
- `registry` : The ship's registry.
- `class` : The ship's design classification.
- `status` : Current status of the ship.
- `image` : URL path to an image.

Update a Ship.

### Parameters
- `id` : `Integer` id of the Ship to update.
- `name` : The ship's name.
- `registry` : The ship's registry.
- `class` : The ship's design classification.
- `status` : Current status of the ship.
- `image` : URL path to an image.
- `user_generated` : `Integer` specifying if ship was generated by a user (`1`) or not (`0`).

Delete a Ship by `id`.

_Any Character-Ship relationship records associated with this Ship will also be deleted._

request.description: Get a Character by `id`.

Create a new Character.

### Parameters
- `name` : The character's name.
- `species_id` : `Integer` pointing to a Species id.
- `gender` : A string representing a character's gender. Typically `m` for male and `f` for female.
- `dob` : A string date specifying the characters date of birth.
- `actor` : The name of the actor who protrayed the character.
- `image` : URL path to an image.
- `status` : Current status of the character.

Update a Character.

### Parameters
- `id` : `Integer` id of the character to update.
- `name` : The character's name.
- `species_id` : `Integer` pointing to a Species id.
- `gender` : A string representing a character's gender. Typically `m` for male and `f` for female.
- `dob` : A string date specifying the characters date of birth.
- `actor` : The name of the actor who protrayed the character.
- `image` : URL path to an image.
- `status` : Current status of the character.
- `user_generated` : `Integer` specifying if character was generated by a user (`1`) or not (`0`).

Delete a Character by `id`.

_Any Character-Ship relationship records associated with this Character will also be deleted._

_Any Character-Rank relationship records associated with this Character will also be deleted._
Get all species records.

request.description: Get a Species by `id`.

Create a new Species record.

### Parameters
- `name` : The species name.
- `origin` : Name of the planet where species originated.

Update a Species record.

### Parameters
- `id` : `Integer` id of species record to update.
- `name` : The species name.
- `origin` : Name of the planet where species originated.
- `user_generated` : `Integer` specifying if species was generated by a user (`1`) or not (`0`).
Delete a Species by `id`.
Get all Ranks.

response.name: Get all ranks

request.description: Get a Rank by `id`.

Create a new Rank.

### Parameters
- `name` - The rank's name.

Update a rank record.

### Parameters
- `id` : `Integer` id of the rank to update.
- `name` : The rank's name.
- `user_generated` : `Integer` specifying if rank was generated by a user (`1`) or not (`0`).

Delete a Rank by `id`.

_Any Character-Rank relationship records associated with this Rank will also be deleted._

Get all Character-Ship relationships.

These records define the relationship between a Character (`character_id`) and a Ship (`ship_id`) starting at a specific date (`effective_date`).
That is to say, _when_ a _character_ began serving on _ship_.
Get a character-ship relationship by its `id`.

response.name: Get a character-ship relationship by its id

request.description:
Get all character-ship relationships by character `id`.

This call will return all Ships that the specified Character has served on.

response.name: Get all character-ship relationships by a character id

request.description:
Get all character-ship relationships by Ship `id`.

This call will return all Characters that have served on the specified Ship.

response.name: localhost:3000/characterships/byshipid/1

request.description:
Create a new Character-Ship relationship.

This call creates a new relationship between a Character and a Ship at a specific date.

### Parameters
- `character_id` : `Integer` that points to a Character record.
- `ship_id` : `Integer` that points to a Ship record.
- `effective_date` : `String` date that marks the start of the relationship.

Update a Character-Ship relationship.

### Parameters
- `id` : `Integer` id of the record to update.
- `character_id` : `Integer` that points to a Character record.
- `ship_id` : `Integer` that points to a Ship record.
- `effective_date` : `String` date that marks the start of the relationship.
Delete a character-ship relationship record by `id`.

Get all Character-Rank relationships.

These records define the relationship between a Character (`character_id`) and a Rank (`rank_id`) beginning on a specific date (`effective_date`).
Get a Character-Rank relationship by `id`.

Get all character-rank relationships by character id.

This call will return all Ranks that the specified Character has held, and the dates these ranks too effect.

Create a character-rank relationship.

### Parameters
- `character_id` : `Integer` id of the character.
- `rank_id` : `Integer` id of the rank.
- `effective_date` : `String` date that marks the start of the relationship.

Update a character-rank relationship.

### Parameters
- `id` : `Integer` id of the record to update.
- `character_id` : `Integer` id of the character.
- `rank_id` : `Integer` id of the rank.
- `effective_date` : `String` date that marks the start of the relationship.
Delete a Character-Rank relationship by `id`.
